Translations.Text: nivu allahanalli bharavase idiri. Khanditavagiyu nivu bahala vyaktavada satyadalliruviri
sattavarige kelisalu nimage khandita sadhyavilla mattu kivudaru bennu tirugisi horatu bittaga, avarige kelisalikku nimage sadhyavilla
niviruvudu kurudarannu avara darigeditanadinda horatandu avarige daritorisuvudakkalla. Nam'ma vacanagalannu nambuvavaru hagu saranaguvavarige matra nivu kelisaballiri

avara visayadalli (allahana) tirpu prakatavaguva samaya bandaga navu avarigagi bhumiyinda ondu praniyannu horadisuvevu. Adu avarodane matanaduvudu. An'yatha janaru nam'ma vacanagalannu ditavagi nambuttiralilla
navu pratiyondu samudayadinda, nam'ma vacanagalannu tiraskarisuttiddavara ondu dandannu serisuva dina avarannu salugattisalaguvudu
avarellaru bandu bittaga avanu (allahanu) heluvanu; nimage nanna vacanagala kuritu jnanada sulive illadiddaru nivu avugalannu tiraskarisiddira? Nivu adenella maduttiddiri
Avaru esagida akramadindagi avara virud'dha (sikseya) tirpu jarigollalide mattu avarige matanadalikku sadhyavagadu
avaru visramisalendu navu ratriyannu hagu ellavannu kanalendu hagalannu nirmisiruvudannu avaru kanuttillave? Nambuvavarige idaralli khandita pathagalive
mattu (lokantyada) kahale udalaguva a dina, allahanu icchisidavara horatu, akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalli iruvavarella bhayabhitaragiruvaru mattu ellaru vidheyaragi avana munde baruvaru

(indu) nivu parvatagalannu kandu, avu bahala sthiravagive endu bhavisuttiri. Adare (andu) avugalu modagalante calisuvavu. Idella allahana kaigarike. Avanu ellavannu bahala pakvavagiye rupisiddane. Nivu maduvudellavannu avanu khanditavagi ballanu
(andu) olitannu taruvatanige adakkinta uttamavadudu sigalide mattu anthavaru andu ella bhayagalinda muktaragi suraksitaragiruvaru
